profile:
Beaver Paving Ltd. is a full service asphalt paving and Interlocking company. Established in 1980, Beaver  Paving Ltd. has been operating as family run business for over 35 years. With the original owner who continues to oversee and be involved with all aspects of the business, they have earned a reputation as being an exemplary company who excels in providing quality performance and customer service.
 
OUR GUARANTEE 
Beaver Paving Ltd ,we individually design and engineer your driveway using the highest quality materials combining expertise with experience. Although residential driveways and commercial lot designs and projects may vary from client to client, specifications and skill are always guaranteed to be consistent; from the biggest job to the smallest. 
Beaver Paving provides a full 12 month written guarantee with every contract.
 
Our Services Include: 
*Residential Paving 
*Commercial Paving 
*Asphalt Paving Contracting 
*Driveway Extensions 
*Sub-base Excavation 
*Grading Work, Regrading and Compacting 
*Interlocking Work 
*Concrete Floors and Pads 
*Walkway Reconstruction 
*Parking Lots 
*Industrial Lots 
*Commercial Plazas 
*Condominium Laneways 
*Grinding / Pulverizing 
*Resurfacing 
*Patch Work 
*Asphalt Grindings 
*Catch Basin Installations 
*Painted Line Markings 
*Rural Laneways

profile:
* NO DEPOSITS ARE REQUIRED for RESIDENTIAL ASPHALT PAVING OF DRIVEWAYS. 

* NO DEPOSITS ARE REQUIRED for most INTERLOCKING STONE INSTALLATIONS.


PROUDLY SERVING : VAUGHAN, Concord, Thornhill, Maple, Woodbridge, Kleinburg, RICHMOND HILL, OAK RIDGES, MARKHAM, SCARBOROUGH, MISSISSAUGA, BRAMPTON, YORK REGION, KING CITY, AURORA, WHITCHURCH-STOUFFVILLE, BALLANTRAE, CEDAR VALLEY, NEWMARKET, NORTH YORK, EAST YORK, ETOBICOKE,TORONTO and the GTA, Ontario.
*
AT CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION, we specialize in NEW INSTALLATIONS of expertly PAVED RESIDENTIAL ASPHALT DRIVEWAYS, INTERLOCKING STONE, CONCRETE and NATURAL STONE.  
*
Our quality installations, attention to detail and warranties are unsurpassed.
*
We take pride in our workmanship, as well as in the planning and in the design of your project. We will enhance the beauty, comfort and curb-appeal of your home, while providing you with surface durability, added value and long lasting functionality. 

Furthermore, we can provide you with EXPERT REPAIRS to most interlocking stone, concrete and natural stone surfaces. 
*
By providing you with all of these service options, CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION eliminates your need to deal with multiple paving contractors. Your priorities are our top concerns.

We will help you to avoid extended construction project schedules and unnecessary expenses. We are always available to address any project-related questions, issues or concerns.  

We strive to provide you with professional guidance, workmanship, consultation and on-site supervision in order to make your new project experience with our paving company, a truly easy and pleasant one. 

*
All of our new ASPHALT installations come with a 1 YEAR WRITTEN INSTALLATION WARRANTY.
*
All of our new INTERLOCKING STONE installations come with a 2 YEAR WRITTEN INSTALLATION WARRANTY.
*
CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION provides a 3 YEAR WRITTEN WARRANTY on ALL new installations of NATURAL STONE and CONCRETE. 

We would be pleased to offer you A PERSONAL PROFESSIONAL CONSULTATION and A PRECISE ESTIMATE on your next planned outdoor project.
products:
Follow us on our Facebook Timeline at: Century Paving and Construction. 
View us at: Canada.ca Innovation Science and industry capability and on LinkedIn Canada.
services: The installation of paved asphalt driveways, Interlocking Stone,Stamped Concrete, Natural Stone and of concrete surfaces. We also provide REPAIRS to interlocking stone, concrete and to most natural stone surfaces.
brands:
We deal with some of the best manufacturers and suppliers of interlocking stone, including : UNILOCK, BEST WAY STONE, TECHNO-BLOCK, RB, ALLAN BLOCK, PERMACON & OAKS. 
Beaver Valley Stone is our preferred interlocking stone and NATURAL STONE supplier.
specialities:
Prior to paving, we can provide you with : EXPERT REPAIRS and ADJUSTMENTS to interlocking stone,natural stone and concrete surfaces. 
  We provide our much valued clients with additional options and choices to suit any budget and priority. 
You can be sure that all repairs and adjustments will be completed before the scheduled installation of asphalt or of any other adjacent surfaces. Scheduling, preparation and timing are some of the key elements for a successful and well coordinated,outdoor paving and landscaping project.
name: Century Paving And Construction

profile:
Crest Top Group Inc. is a comprehensive landscaping and paving company with years of experience. The company takes honesty as its tenet, pays attention to quality, and provides professional services to customers with innovative design and construction knowledge. The company has always been aiming at "Building your dream home with our hands", from product to solution, from pre-assessment to after-sales service, and strive to achieve the ultimate in every aspect.

After years of hard work, we not only have a team with skilled and standardized management, but also maintain friendly and cooperative relations with various high-quality construction and materials companies in the field, and have won wide recognition and high praise from customers. The company also uses 5 million commercial engineering insurance as a guarantee of your confidence, so you have no worries.

profile:
Sprayman Group Installs Commercial & Industrial Interior Flooring Services - The Sprayman Group provides unique flooring protection, renewal and maintenance options resulting in high-quality, attractive and durable finishes.

Sprayman repairs concrete decks, floors, sidewalks, steps and foundations.  We also offer concrete grinding and concrete polishing for all of our residential and commercial customers.

We will contact you within 24 hours of receiving your request.
services:
Concrete repairs; decks, floors, sidewalks, steps and foundations.

Epoxy-type floor coatings for garages, basements, porches, stairs, as well as industrial and commercial settings

Asphalt repairs; cracks, potholes, sealing, line painting, driveway curb repairs (where asphalt meets garage curb), catch basin repairs.
